Title: A King in New York
Actors: Charles Chaplin, Maxine Audley, Jerry Desmonde, Oliver Johnston
Plot: Due to a revolution in his country, King Shahdov comes to New York - almost broke. To get some money he goes to TV, making commercials and meets the child from communist parents. Due to this he is suddenly a suspected as a communist himself and has to face one of McCarthy's hearings.
